events.name: LSD
events.description: LSD was first synthesized by Swiss chemist Albert Hofmann on November 16, 1938, at Sandoz Laboratories in Basel, Switzerland. However, its psychoactive properties were not discovered until April 19, 1943, when Hofmann accidentally ingested some of the substance, leading to the first intentional "acid trip"
